245b6(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs par byas zhes bya ba ni sdom pa dang sdom par byed pa dang / sbed pa dang sbed par byed pa dang / ro myang ba dang / mngon par dga'o ba ste/ bsam gtan dang po de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni mi skye ba'i
246a1(rgyud 'grel): chos la bzod pa khong du chud par bya ba'i 'dun pa dang 'dod pa thob ste/ de mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'i 'dun pa dang 'dod pa des bsam gtan dang po la snying por 'du shes pa ma yino// de bsam
246a2(rgyud 'grel): gtan gnyis pa rtsom ste/ de bsam gtan dang po'i rtog pa dang dpyod pa de dag zhi bar byed nye bar zhi bar byed/ de dag las sems rab tu zhi bar byed cing bsam gtan gnyis pa'i yong su 'grub pa'i rgyu tshol te/ rtog pa dang
246a3(rgyud 'grel): dpyod pa dang bral bas nang yongasu dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa dang / dpyod pa med pa dga' ba dang ldan pa bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gnaso// de la nad yongasu dang ba ni de'i bas
246a4(rgyud 'grel): gton gnyis pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi chos gang yin pa de dag nye bar zhi ba dang dad ba yin te/ de'i phyir nang yongasu dang ba zhes bya'o// rgyud gcig tu gyur ces bya ba ni bsam gtan dang po'i rtog pa dang dpyod pa de dag
246a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rab tu zhi nas rgya mtsho'i chu ltar ro gcig tu 'gyur ba thob pa'o// 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen por chu 'bab pa rnams lan tsha'i ror ro gcig par gyur pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan
246a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa la snyoms par zhugs pa bsam gtan dang po'i rtog pa dang dpyod pa de dag thams cad zhi nas ro gcig tu 'gyur te/ de ting 'dzin ces bya'o// ting 'dzin de las de sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun
246b1(rgyud 'grel): la dga' ba skyes te/ dkon mchog gsum la dga' bas dge ba'i chos rnams rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de las mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i 'dun pa shin tu 'bar ba dang / shin tu 'od gsal ba dang / shin
246b2(rgyud 'grel): tu yid du 'ong ba 'thob po// de mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa la 'dun pa des bsam gtan gnyis pa de la ma chags te/ bsam gtan gsum pa kun tu cho lo// de 'di snyam du sems te/ dga' ba ni bsam gtan gsum
246b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sgrib pa yino// snyam nas de dga' ba de la 'dod chags dang bral nas btang snyoms can dran pa yongasu dag pa 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dga' ba med pa bde ba la gnas pa zhes brjod pa bsam gtan
246b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa rdzogs par byas twa gan so// ting 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga'u ba la 'dod chags dang bral ba 'thob pa de gang de dga' bya med pa'i bde ba de ni gtan du bde ba ma yin gyi zad pa'i chos can te// mi rtag
246b5(rgyud 'grel): cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin zhing de yid brtan du mi rung ngo snyam pa'i sems de lta bu 'thob bo// de de ltar shes nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pa'i 'dun pa drag po chen po 'thob bo// de mi skye ba'i
246b6(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi 'dun pa drag po des bde ba dang sdug bsngal la mngon par chags pa mi skye'o// de bde ba yang spangs te snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid mi bde ba nub pas bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal
247a1(rgyud 'grel): ba yang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongasu drug pa bsam gtan bzhi pa yongasu rdzogs par byas te gan so// de bsam gtan bzhi bya la snyoms par zhugs pas sems mnyen pa
247a2(rgyud 'grel): dang / sems 'dod par bya ba dang / sems la su rung ba dang / sems 'od gsal ba dang / sems drang ba dang / sems bde ba de sems can thams cad kyis mngon par dga' ba dang / sems can thams cad
247a3(rgyud 'grel): la phan pa dang bde bar mngon par phyogs par 'gyur pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i snang ba skyes par 'gyur te/ de'i gong du de la lhun gyis grub par lam la 'jug cing / gnas par 'gyur ro// /
247a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa gzhan yang btsun pa shA ra t+na tI'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi zad pa ni rnam pa bcu drug ste/ de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la me do// de la
247a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa bcu drug po dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni de la ma chags pa'o// bdag bde ba
247a6(rgyud 'grel): la chags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni ro myang ba med pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni snying rje chen
247b1(rgyud 'grel): po la dmigs pa'o// 'dod pa'i kham su dmigs pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni ting 'dzin ldog pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa kun shes pa'i phyir byang chub sems
247b2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni mngon par shes pa yongasu sbyang ba byas pa'o// sems kyi dbang phyug shes pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni sems la su rung ba'o// gzugs dang gzugs
247b3(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i khams zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang / ldang ba thams cad shes pa'o// /
247b4(rgyud 'grel): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snyoms par 'jug pa zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni zhi ba dang rab tu zhi ba'o// shin tu mthar thug pa'i phyir byang chub sems
247b5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni mi 'khrugs pa'o// nyon mongs pa dang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad legs par 'joms pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni log pa'i gnyen
247b6(rgyud 'grel): po'o// 'jig rten thams cad las bsgral ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni shes rab la 'jug pa'o// sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam
248a1(rgyud 'grel): gtan ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa sngon du 'gro ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan mi zad pa yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam
248a2(rgyud 'grel): gtan ni dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi gcod pa'o// rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni ma nyams pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs par
248a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i ye sheso// ye shes kyi bdag nyid che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni nam mkha' khyab ste/
248a4(rgyud 'grel): btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams pa bcu drug ste/ gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag la med pa'o// de la bsam gtan yongasu sbyangs pa
248a5(rgyud 'grel): gang zhe na/ gang mngon par shes pa dang / ye shes yong su rdzogs pa'o// de la mngon par shes pa ni gang ye shes ni gang zhe na/ gang gi gzugasu snang ba thams cad mthong ba 'di ni mngon par shes pa zhes bya'o// /
248a6(rgyud 'grel): gang gis gzugs thams cad kyi chos nyid mi zad par shes kyang mi zad pa'i chos mngon sum du mi byed pa 'di ni ye shes bya'o// gang gi slar grags pa thams cad shes pa de ni mngon par shes pa zhes bya'o// /
248b1(rgyud 'grel): gang sgra thams cad sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mthar brjod du med par shes pa 'di ni ye shes zhes bya'o// gang gis sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams shes pa 'di ni mngon par shes pa zhes bya'o//
248b2(rgyud 'grel): gang sems 'gog par shes la sems 'gog pa mngon sum du mi byed pa 'di ni ye shes zhes bya'o// gang sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' rje su dran po 'di ni mngon par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang dus gsum la
248b3(rgyud 'grel): ma chags par shes pa 'di ni ye shes zhes bya'o// gang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing du 'gro ba 'di ni mngon par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang gis zhing na mkha' dang mtshungs par shes pa 'di ni ye shes zhes bya'o// /
248b4(rgyud 'grel): gang dbyer med pa'i chos 'dod pa 'di ni mngon par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang chos thams cad mnyam par mthong ba'i shes pa 'di ni ye shes zhes bya'o// gang 'jig rten thams cad dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid 'di ni
248b5(rgyud 'grel): mngon par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad dang ma 'dres par shes pa 'di ni ye shes zhes bya'o// gang brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba rnams zil gyis gnon pa 'di ni mngon
248b6(rgyud 'grel): par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyi bor shes pa 'di ni ye shes zhes bya ste/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsam gtan yongasu
249a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyang ba zhes bya'o// yang sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang sems g.yeng ba ji snyed par byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi tshogs dang sems bzhag pa'ang de
249a2(rgyud 'grel): snyed de/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang sems g.yeng ba ji snyed pa de skyid du byang chub sems depas kyang bsam gtan gyi tshogs yang dag par bsgrub par bya'o// mnyam pa de nyid de las gnas
249a3(rgyud 'grel): pas na de'i phyir mnyam par bzhag pa zhes bya'o// sems can mnyam pa nyid dang / sems mnyam pa nyid dang / bsam pa mnyam pa nyid dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa mnyam pa nyid dang / sbyor ba mnyam pa nyid dang /
249a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab mnyam pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas na de'i phyir snyoms par
249a5(rgyud 'grel): zhugs pa zhes bya'o// ti nge 'dzin gang dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang de dang mnyam+bo// byang chub gang dang mnyam pa sems can thams cad kyang de dang mnyamo// sems can thams cad kyang de dang mnyam pa chos thams
249a6(rgyud 'grel): cod kyang de dang mnyam ste/ mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas na de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o// byang chub gang dang mnyam pa stong pa nyid gang de dang mnya mo// stong pa nyid gang dang mnyam
249b1(rgyud 'grel): pa sems can thams cad kyang de dang mnyamo// sems can thams cad gang dang mnyam pa chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam ste/ mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas na de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa
249b2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// stong pa nyid gang dang mnyam pa mtshan ma med pa yang de dang mnyamo// mtshan ma med pa gang dang mnyam pa sems can thams cad kyang de dang mnyamo// sems can thams cad gang dang mnyam pa chos thams
249b3(rgyud 'grel): cad kyang de dang mnyam ste/ mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas na de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o// mtshan ma med pa gang dang mnyam pa smon pa med pa'ang de dang mnyamo// smon pa med pa gang dang
249b4(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa sems can thams cad kyang de dang mnyamo// sems can thams cad gang dang mnyam phra chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyamo// mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas na de'i phyir snyoms pa zhes bya'o//
249b5(rgyud 'grel): smon pa med pa gang dang mnyam pa mngon par 'du mi byed pa'ang de dang mnyamo// mngon par 'du mi byed pa gang dang mnyam pa sems can thams cad kyang de dang mnyamo// sems can thams cad gang dang mnyam pa
249b6(rgyud 'grel): chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam ste/ mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas na de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o// mngon par 'du mi byed pa gang dang mnyam pa mi skye ba yang de dang mnyamo// /
250a1(rgyud 'grel): mi skye ba gang dang mnyam pa sems can thams cad kyang de dang mnya mo// sems can thams cad gangang+gA dang mnyam pa chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam ste/ mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par
250a2(rgyud 'grel): zhugs pas na de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o// mi skye ba gang dang mnyam pa mi 'byung ba yang de dang mnyamo// mi 'byung ba gang dang mnyam pa sems can thams cad kyang de dang mnya mo// sems can
250a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad gang dang mnyam pa chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyamo ste/ mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas na de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o// mi 'byung ba gang dang mnyam pa dngos po med pa yang
250a4(rgyud 'grel): de dang mnyamo// dngos po med pa gang dang mnyam pa sems can thams cad kyang de dang mnyamo// sems can thams cad gang dang mnyam pa chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam ste/ mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par
250a5(rgyud 'grel): zhugs pas na de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o// dngos po med pa gang dang mnyam pa rnam par dag pa ya da de dang mnya mo// rnam par dag pa gang dang mnyam pa sems can thams cad kyang de dang mnyam/
250a6(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad gang dang mnyam pa chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam ste/ mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas na de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o// rang gi sems mnyam pas sems
250b1(rgyud 'grel): can thams cad kyi sems mnyam pa nyid/ de la zhugs pas na de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o// de lta bu la snyoms par zhugs pas na/ bsam gtan chen po ting 'dzin gnas zhes bya'o// byang chub sems
250b2(rgyud 'grel): dpa'i sa mngon du gyur pa la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la lhag par spyod pa yin la/ de'i bdag nyid can yin pas na/ shes rab chen po lus 'chang ba zhes bya ste/ shes rab nyid lus yin la de'i bdag
250b3(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyis 'dzin par mdzad pas na shres rab chen po lus 'chang pa'o// de yod shes rab de'i rnam pa ni ji lta bu/ 'jug pA ni ci zhe na/ thos pa ni rnam pa'o// tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ni 'jug pa'o// thos pa
250b4(rgyud 'grel): yang rnam pa ni ji lta bu/ 'jug pa ni ci zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thos pa'i rnam pa ni brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'dun pa'i rnam pa dang / bsam pa'i rnam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa'i
250b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa dang / sbyor ba'i rnam pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rnam pa dang / nga rgyal med pa'i rnam pa dang / bag yod pa'i rnam pa dang / gus par byed pa'i rnam pa dang / mthun par 'dzin pa'i rnam pa dang
250b6(rgyud 'grel): dka' blo bde bo'i rnam pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa'i rnam pa dang / rna ba blags te nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / yid la byed pa'i rnam pa dang / rnam par mi g.yeng ba'i rnam pa dang / gnas kyi rnam pa dang / chos la
251a1(rgyud 'grel): rin po cher 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / sman du 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i nAd thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i rnam pa dang / dran pa'i snod kyi rnam pa dang / rtogs pa shes pa'i rnam pa dang /
251a2(rgyud 'grel): b+h+yo sa 'dod pa'i rnam pa dang / b+h+rUM la 'jug pa'i rnam pa dang / sang+yas rgyas kyi chos la mi ngom sde par nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / gtang po sbrelta ba'i rnam pa dang / dul zhing cing shes pa'i rnam pa dang / mang du thos pa la rten
251a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rnam pa dang / bsti stang du byas te dge' ba myang bar byed pa'i rnam pa dang / lus bde ba'i rnam pa dang / sems rab tu dga' ba'i rnam pa dang / mi skyo bar nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / don nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / chos
251a4(rgyud 'grel): nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / nan tan nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / gzhan gyi bstan pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / chos ma thos pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par shes pa nyon pa'i rnam pa dang / theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa med pa'i rnam
251a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / thabs mkhas pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa nyan pa'i
251a6(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / skye ba la mkhas pa'i rnam pa dang / mi skye ba la mkhas pa'i rnam pa dang / mi sdug pa'i rnam pa dang / byams pa'i rnam pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung
251b1(rgyud 'grel): baba'i rnam pa dang / mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi bzhi rnam pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnams pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam
251b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i rnam pa dang / dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa'i rnam pa dang / bden pa'i byin gyis bslabs pa'i rnam pa dang / chud mi gzon pa'i rnam pa dang / rang gi kha na las pa'i rnam pa dang /
251b3(rgyud 'grel): rang gi sems bskyang ba'i rnam pa dang / brtson 'grus mi gtong ba'i rnam pa dang / chos la nges paru sems pa'i rnam pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po'i rnam pa dang / rang gi phyogs bsrung ba'i rnam pa dang /
251b4(rgyud 'grel): rol gyi phyogs dang / nyon mongs pa tshar gcod pa'i rnam pa dang / nor bdun yang dag par 'du ba'i rnam pa dang / dbul ba thams cad gcod pa'i rnam pa dang / 'dzangs pas bsdogs pa'i rnam pa dang / mkhas pa
251b5(rgyud 'grel): mngon par dga' ba'i rnam pa dang / 'phags pa kun shes pa'i rnam pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa dang par byed pa'i rnam pa dang / bdun pa mthong ba'i rnam pa dang / phung po'i skyon rnam par spangs pa'i rnam pa
251b6(rgyud 'grel): dang / 'dus byas kyi skyon la yong su 'jal ba'i rnam pa dang / don la rton pa'i rnam pa dang / chos la rton pa'i rnam pa dang / ye shes la rton pa'i rnam pa dang / nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa'i rnam pa dang /
252a1(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa thams cad mi bya ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i rnam pa dang / legs par bya ba'i las kyi rnam pa dang / mi 'gyod pa'i rnam pa dang / khyad par du 'gro ba'i rnam pa dang
252a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'thob pa'i rnam pa ste/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thos pa brgyad cu rtsa bzhi zhes bya'o// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshul bzhin yid
252a3(rgyud 'grel): la byed pa la 'jug pa ni sum cu rtsa gnyis te/ sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zhi gnas kyi gnas la 'jug pa dang / lhag mthong rnam par dpyod pa'i 'jug pa dang / sems la su rung ba la 'jug pa dang / lus
252a4(rgyud 'grel): dben pa la 'jug pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pa dang / bden pa'i rdza su mthun pa la 'jug pa dang / chad pa med pa la 'jug pa dang / rtag pa med pa la 'jug pa dang / rgyu dang rkyen la 'jug pa dang
252a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag med pa dang sems can med pa dang srog med pa dang gang zag med la 'jug pa dang / 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dang gnas pa med pa la 'jug pa dang / mi 'phro zhing rgyu dang 'bras bu chud mi za ba la 'jug pa dang /
252a6(rgyud 'grel): stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa 'dris par byed pa la 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa mngon sum du mi byed pa la 'jug pa dang / bsam gtan dang ting nge
252b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed pa'i tshul pa dang / bsam gtan dang tingange 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye ba la 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa'i ye shes bskyed pa la 'jug pa dang /
252b2(rgyud 'grel): zag pa zad pa mngon sum du byed po ma yin pa la 'jug pa dang / nang du rtog pa la 'jug pa dang / nges par gyur bar mi 'jug pa la 'jug pa dang / 'dus byas kyi skyon yongasu 'jal ba la 'jug pa dang / 'dus ma
252b3(rgyud 'grel): byas kyi chos mngon sum du mi byed par 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad la bdag med par so sor rtog pa la 'jug pa dang / snying rje chen po mi gtong ba la 'jug pa dang / skye ba thams cad la 'jigs par
252b4(rgyud 'grel): blta ba la 'jug pa dang / rtag tu bsams bzhin du shes pas srid pa thams cad yongasu 'dzin par 'jug pa dang / yid 'byung zhing 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos kyi mngon sum du mi byed pa la 'jug pa dang /
252b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i dga' ba'i yon tan yal bar 'dor ba la 'jug pa dang / chos kyi dga' ba mi gtong ba la 'jug pa dang / spros pa dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad spong ba la 'jug pa dang / thobs mkhas pa'i spros
252b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / rnam par rtog pa mi spong bar 'jug ste/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la 'jug pa sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes bya'o// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
253a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang tshul bzhin zhes bya ba de ni rigs pa'i tshigo/ de ni tshul gyi tshigo/ de ni sgo'i tshigo/ de ni kha'i tshigo/ de ni rgyu'i tshi go/ de ni rkyen gyi tshig/ de ni mi 'gog pa'i tshi go/ dre ni mi 'gal ba'i
253a2(rgyud 'grel): go zhes bya ba nas de bzhin du ji srid du chos thams cad rigs pas ji ltar gnas pa bzhin mthong na de ltar mthong ba ni tshul bzhin mthong ba'o// 'khor ba'i khams kyi tshul bzhin gang yin pa mya ngan las
253a3(rgyud 'grel): 'das pa'i dbyings kyi tshul yang de yino// zhes gang gis de ltar mtshungs shing be brag med par mthong ba de ni tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ gang de ltar chos kyi rnam pa dang /
253a4(rgyud 'grel): thos pa'i rnam pa dang / tshul bzhin la 'jug pa'i sbyor ba'i rgyu mthun pa de ni shes rab ces bya'o// de ltar de lta bu'i rnam pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de nges par 'byed pa'i shes rab ste/ de gnyi ga'i ngo bo
253a5(rgyud 'grel): nyid 'dzin par mdzad pas na/ shes rab chen po lus 'chang ba zhes bya ste/ dpal ldan rdo rje snying po'i rgyan las kyang / badre gshegs dri med shes rab ni// rdo rje rnon po r-i de bsha do zhes gsungs pa'i phyi ro// /
253a6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa'i sa ring du song ba la ni thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la lhag par spyod pas na thabs chen te/ thabs kyi sgra 'das ni thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i
253b1(rgyud 'grel): thabs sgrub pa gang zhe na/ gang byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag kyang mi dmigs la rtag tu bdag nyid kyis sbed pa yang spyod// sems can yang mi dmigs la/ rtag tu sems can yong su smin par byed pa'i
253b2(rgyud 'grel): brtson pa yang spyod do// nyon mongs pa yang mi dmigs la/ rtag tu dpung po rnams sbed pa la yang spyo // de lnga gang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs ma yin pa'i gzugs ma yin pa'i gzugs can zad kyang
253b3(rgyud 'grel): snang baR+Sha mi 'gyur la/ rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod pa yang yino// de lA gang chos kyi sgra ma yin pa'i sgra gang yang grags par mi 'gyur la/ rtag tu chos nyan pas ngoms mi myong ba yang yino// 'khor
253b4(rgyud 'grel): bi yang mi dmigs pa rtag tu 'khor bas 'jigs pa'i yid dang ldan pa yang yino// mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag par rje su mi mthong la/ mya ngan las 'das pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir bdog pa thams
253b5(rgyud 'grel): cad yongasu gtong bar byed// sangs rgyas dang byang chub kyang mi dmigs lnga/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir smon lam brgya stong mang po yang mngon par sgrub ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems
253b6(rgyud 'grel): dpe'i thabs sgrub pa zhes bya'o// gzhon gyi don la 'jug pa thams cad ni thabs kyi nang du 'dres pa'o// de lta bu'i thabs chen po dang ldan pa ni 'dzom pa'i dbyangs// / byang chub sems da
254a1(rgyud 'grel): sa mi g.yo ba la ni smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par smin pa'i tshul du lhag par spyod cing smon lam chen po mnga' bas smon lam chen po ste/ chen po'i sgra ni thabs bzhin du 'di la
254a2(rgyud 'grel): yang sbyar par bya'o// de la smon lam yang 'jam dpal gyi zhing gau bkod pa las sngoni bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i dbyangs 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po na mkha' zhes bya bar gyur pa na bcom ldan
254a3(rgyud 'grel): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i spyan sngar smon lam tshad med pa btab pa lta bu ste/ de yang de nas rgyal po na mkha' srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brgyad cus yongasu
254a4(rgyud 'grel): bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'bru sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po ga lu ba der dong ste/ lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom
254a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das de la len bdun bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// rigs kyi bu de nas rgyal po na mkha' zhes bya ba des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po
254a6(rgyud 'grel): ge la ba de logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad de gsol ba/ khyod kyi zhal sngar chos dam zhu// skyes bu'i dam pa mchog skye bar// rnam pa gang gi 'gyur ba de// rnam par
254b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dren pas bdag la gsungs// rnam 'dren khyod la mngon sum du// mchod pa yangs pa bgyid bgyid kyang // ma nges sems kyis bgyid 'gyur gyis// gang yang yongasu bsngo ma bgyis// bdag ni gcig tu
254b2(rgyud 'grel): dben gnas che// 'di 'dra'i sems zhig skyes par gyur// bdag gis bsod nams che bsags na// ji ltar yongasu de bsngo snyam// tshangs par bsngo 'am brgya byin nam// gling bzhi dbang phyug thob pa'am// 'on
254b3(rgyud 'grel): te nyan thos dngos por 'am// rang rgyal thob pa'i phyir bsngo snyam// de ltar sems bskyed de ma thag lha rnams sgra 'byin brjod pa ni// dam pa'i sems kyis bsod nams 'di// rnam par chung gson ma byed
254b4(rgyud 'grel): cig/ sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// smon lam rlabs chen gdab par gyis// byang chub sems rab bskyed byas shing // 'jig rten rnams kyi don yang gyis// de bas chos kyi dbang phyug gats+tsha// rdzogs sa
254b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas la bdag zhu ste// thub pa ji ltar sems bskyed na// rdzogs pa'i byang chub skye bar 'gyur// ye shes de ni gang gis 'thob// de don bdag la bstan du gsol// byang chub sems ni bskyed bgyis shing // thub
254b6(rgyud 'grel): pa khyod 'drar bdag kyang smon// de yi tshig de gosan gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa// rgyal po chen pos shes par gyis// rim gyis khyod la bstan par bya// chos rnams thams cad rkyen
255a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin te/ 'dun pa'i rtse la rab tu gnas// gang gis smon lam ci btab pa// de yi 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// rgyal po ngas kyang sngan chad ni// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed
255a2(rgyud 'grel): gyur/ sems can kun la phan don du// ngas ni smon lam dam pa btab/ skyon lam ji ltar btab tshul du// ngas ni 'bras bu thob par gyur// byang chub dam pA des thob pas// nga yau bsam pa rdzogs par
255a3(rgyud 'grel): gyur// rgyal po chen po brtan gyis la// mi 'gyur sems ni bskyed par gyis// gal te skyed pa spyad byas na// khyod kyang yang dag sangs rgyas gyur// thub pa'i gsung ni thos gyur nas/ rgyal po de ni dga'
255a4(rgyud 'grel): bar gyur// 'jig rten kun gyis mngon sum du// seng ge'i da ro ro tshig 'di brjod// 'khor ba'i blo ma med pa yau// sngon gyi mtha' ni srid pa// de srid sems can phan don du// spyod pa dpag yasa? spyad par bya/
255a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan snga der// byang chub mchog tu sem bskyed// 'gro ba thams cad mgron gnyer te/ dbul zhing phongs las dra grol bar bya// di ring phran chad gal te yang // bdag gis
255a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags sems bskyed ni// phyogs bcu dag na gang bzhugs po'i// sangs rgyas thams cad bslus par gyur// byang chub nam zhig thob par du// tha ba'i sems dang 'dod sems dang // phra dog dang ni
255b1(rgyud 'grel): ser sna yang // de ring phan chud myi bya'o// tshangs pa'i spyod pa bdag gis spyad// sdig pa'i spyod pa yongasu btang // tshul khrims sdom dang des pA la// sangs rgyas rjesu bslab par bya/ bdag ni byang chub ring
255b2(rgyud 'grel): tshul du// 'chang rgyar mos shing spro ba med// phyi mthar thog gi bar du yang // sems can gcig phyir spyad par bya// tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// sangs rgyas zhing ni sbyang bar bya// phyogs rnams bcu po thams
255b3(rgyud 'grel): cad du// bdag gi ming ni thos par bya// bdag gis bdag la lung bstan te// sangs rgyas 'gyur bar dogs pa med// bdag gi lhag bsam rnam par dag/ bdag dbang 'di na 'dren pa rnams// lus dang ngag gla
255b4(rgyud 'grel): las rnams kyang // rnam pa kun tu bdag gis sbyang // yid kyi las kyang sbyang byar bya// mi dge las ni spyad mi bya// ma 'ongs dus na sangs rgyas te// 'jig rten mgon du 'gyur zhe na/ bden pa des ni sa 'di yang // rnam
255b5(rgyud 'grel): pa drug du g.yos gyur cig/ bdag gis bden tshig gang brjod pa// ma nor yang dag smras zhe na// bden pa des ni mkha' dbyings las// sil snyan dag gi sgra grag shog/ bdag la gal te g.yo med cing // de
255b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin tha ba med ce ni// man+da ra yi me tog bzang // bden pa des ni char du pho ba// yang dag don du nges pa yi// tshig bden de skad brjod pa dang // phyogs bcu mtha' yas thams cad kyi// bye ba'i zhing rnams
256a1(rgyud 'grel): rab tu g.yos// de yi mod la mkha' dbyings nas// sil snyan bye ba'i sgra yang byung // me tog man+da ra ba dag/ mi 'greng bdun srid bab par gyur// rgyal po de yi rjes bslabs te// srog chags bye
256a2(rgyud 'grel): ba nyi shu yis// 'dren par bdag cag gyur smon zhes// yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang bsgrags zhes bya ba dang / gzhan yang de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to//
256a3(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs ma mchis pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag gis smon lam btab pa ni/ nam bdag gis phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
256a4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pas bltas na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa de dgra thams cad bdag gis byang chub la yang dag par btsud pa dang / bdag gis byang chub kyi sems

256a6(rgyud 'grel): dang / bdag gis bskul pa dang / bdag gis rjesu bstan par gyur par ma mthong ba de srid du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bya'o//

257a1(rgyud 'grel): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nas yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du byang chub kyi shing drung de nas ma langs kyang bdag gi sprul

257b6(rgyud 'grel): ba 'ga'i yang mi rnyed pa de lta bu dag yongasu tshim pa ma byas par bdag nyid kyis bza' ba ni tshul dang mi 'dra'o zhes bgyi bar dran pa thob par gyur cig de'i mod la de dag mngon par shes pa lnga yongasu gru

259a1(rgyud 'grel): gang zhing nor bu rin po che du mas spras pas nor bu rin po che kun tu bstan pa 'dra la/ rin po che dre drag kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na dkon lA sngan chad ma mthong zhing mi srid pa sha stag ste

259b5(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' gang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du mchis shing dga' ldan gyi gan su tsha bas par bgyis nas byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar
259b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i steng gi bar snang las sil snyan ltar mi gda' ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sgra 'byin pa dang / sil ston de dag las kyang 'dod pa dang
260a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'i sgra mi 'byung gi gzhan du nA pha rol tu phyin pA'i sgra dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi
260a2(rgyud 'grel): sgra 'byin par 'gyur ti/ byang chub sems dpa'i de dag ji lta bur mo so pa'i sgra de lta bu mos por 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhin gshegs pa de la blte 'tshal na 'chag gam 'gro
260a3(rgyud 'grel): 'am/ sdod dam/ mchis kyang rung ste gang dag der sangs rgyas blta ba'i yid la bgyi ba skyes ma thag tu de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs
260a4(rgyud 'grel): pa byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs pa de dag nyid na bzhugs par mthong bar gyur cing // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de mthong ma thag gi the tshom mam/ nem nur ram/ yid gnyis sam/ chos kyi sdom
260a5(rgyud 'grel): TI gling mchis pa yongasu 'chad par 'gyur te/ bstan mi 'tshul bar chos kyi tshig de'i don yongasu 'tshal byar gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam+bu btab bo// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag gis
260a6(rgyud 'grel): ni 'di ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa dag na bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyan dang
260b1(rgyud 'grel): smon lam gyi rgyan dang / mtshan nyid dang / tshad ma dang / spyod pa dang / gnas kyi rnam pa'i rgyan gang ji snyed cig mthong ba las nyan thos kyi bkod pa dang / snyings ma lnga'i sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs par
260b2(rgyud 'grel): de drug thams cad bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig gi nang du 'dus pa dang khongasu chud par bya'o zhes bgyi bar smon lam btab ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag 'tshal nas bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye
260b3(rgyud 'grel): ma snyed du bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa las brtsams te rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan du thogs pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis sug las gzhan ma mchis par bshad dam/ de bas
260b4(rgyud 'grel): kyang ring du bshang+ga kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dag mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro// de la sogs pa smon lam mtha' yus par btab pa de dag yongasu rdzogs shing lhun gyis grub par
260b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa chen por gyur pa ni smon lam chen po'o// de dag byung rje btsun 'jam dpal la dad pa rnams kyis skyon lam ji skad gsungs pa de lta bu'i smon lam gdub par bya'o//
260b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir cung zad tsam zhig rnam par spros nas bshad pa yino// byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros la stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la lhag par spyod pa yino// stobs po
261a1(rgyud 'grel): che la zhes bya ste/ stobs chen po de gang la yod pa de ni stobs po che'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i sa la ni byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bcu dang ldan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la
261a2(rgyud 'grel): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'o// de yang byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bcu ni chos yang dag par sdud pa'i mdo las gsungs te/ de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mos pa'i stobs dang / so sor rtog
261a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i stobs dang / bsgom pa'i stobs dang / bzod pa'i stobs dang / ye shes kyi stobs dang / stong ba'i stobs dang / thos pa'i stobs dang / spobs pa'i stobs dang / bsod nams kyi stobs dang / sgrub pa'i stobs
261a4(rgyud 'grel): spro/ de la mos pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di lta byang chub sems dpa' ni gang dang gang mos pa de'i de de bzhin du 'gyu ro// de mos pa'i stobs de ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis zil gyis gnon mi nus te/
261a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa'i stobs zhes pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i so sor rtog pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod chags skyes pa mi sdug pa bsgoms
261a6(rgyud 'grel): pas zhi bar byed// zhe sdang skyes pa byams pa bsgoms pas zhi bar byed// gti mug skyes pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bsgoms pas zhi bar byed// gshe ba dang mi snyan par zer ba rnams ni brag ca dang
261b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshungs par shes pas yongasu zhi bar byed// gsod pa dang / 'ching ba dang / go rar 'jug pa rnams ni las bdag gir bya ba shes pas zhi bar byed// lus la bsdigs pa dang / lus la gnod pa dang /
261b2(rgyud 'grel): lus nyam nga ba rnams ni gzugs brlan dang mtshungs par shes pas zhi bar byed// de ltar kun+da nus nyon mongs pa'i sgo ji snyed par byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par drug pa'i sgo yang de snyed du mthong ste/
261b3(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i so sor rtog pa'i stabs zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i sgom pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ gang mos pas spyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa la bar ma chod par byed pa'i chos
261b4(rgyud 'grel): de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de lta bar chad byed mi nuso// des mthong ba de dang lam de las lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis dpral bar mi nus te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsgom pa'i stobs
261b5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ gang gis phyir byang chub sems dpa' ni spyod pa brag ca'i sgra dang mtshungs pa'i shes pa'i stobs kyis slar skyo bar mi bya'o// bsdigs
261b6(rgyud 'grel): shing po rdegs kyang gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs par 'du shes pas slar mi bsdigs mi brdego/ gshe yang sems sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa nyid du 'du shes pa'i stobs kyi slar mi gau she'o// khros kyang nang
262a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag par shes pa'i stobs kyis slar mi khro bo// 'jig rten gyi chos rnam par dag pa'i stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis myi 'phrog so// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam
262a2(rgyud 'grel): bar dag pa shes pa'i stobs kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi brdzi'o// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khrug pa'i sgo ji snyed mthong bar rab tu zhi ba'i sgo yang de snyed du mthong ste/ 'di ni bzod pa'i stobs
262a3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi stobs gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched shes pa de dag ni stong pa/ ma skyes pa ma 'gags pa'o// ye shes gang
262a4(rgyud 'grel): gis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yang dag par bsgrub pa dI las mu stegs can dang dmigs pa can thams cad dang / bdud thams cod sangs rgyas kyi gzugasu gnas pas kyang ye shes de la the tshom za bar
262a5(rgyud 'grel): byed mi nus pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi stobs zhes bya'o// de lha byang chub sems dpa'i spong ba'i stobs gang zhe na/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' gnas gcig na gnas pa'i gan du sems
262a6(rgyud 'grel): can thams cad lhags te/ kha ngan zer/ mi snyan pa brjod/ tshig brlang ba dang / tshig rtsub po smra/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi mi bsngags pa brjod kyang / de sems can de dag la mi 'khrug cing //
262b1(rgyud 'grel): yid mi bad+me bar mi 'gyur ro// 'gyod par mi 'gyu ro// bag la nyal bar mi byed// lus bshags pa gtubs kyang de bzhin du bag la nyal mi bskyed do// sems can de dag kyang dkon mchog gsum la rab tu
262b2(rgyud 'grel): dgod de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spong ba'i stobyas zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' thos pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di lnga byang chub sems dpa' ni mang du thos pa 'dzin pa/ thos pa rgya mtsho thos
262b3(rgyud 'grel): pa bsags pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni thos pa'i stobs de lta bu dang ldan no// gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad the tshom bzung ste/
262b4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa'i gan du lhags nas gang sems can gcig gi 'dri ba de gzhan mi 'dri bar thams cad kyis the tshom tha dad par lan gcig tu dris kyang byang chub sems dpa' thags thogs med
262b5(rgyud 'grel): par lan gcig tu 'deb so// bskal pa brgya stong du dris kyang de bzhin du lung ston to// 'di ni byang chub sems dpe'i thos pa'i stobs zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa'i stobs gang
262b6(rgyud 'grel): zhe na/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' 'khor bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i nang du chos ston na/ de mi sems mi rtogs par sems can gang dang gang gi 'dod pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston cing thos par
263a1(rgyud 'grel): byed kyang byang chub sems dpa'i chos ston pa de don nyams par mi 'gyur/ tshig 'bru nyams parla myi 'gyur/ tshig zlos par mi 'gyur/ thogs par mi 'gyur/ gcod par mi 'gyur
263a2(rgyud 'grel): ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa'i stobs zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi stobs gang zhe na/ gril te byang chub sems dpa' shing drung na gnas pa dang / gtsug lag
263a3(rgyud 'grel): khang na gnas kyang rung / khyim stong pa na gnas kyang rung / bdud thams cad 'khor dang bcas te lhags nas bgegs bya ba/ brtse ba'i phyir non tan byed na de bdud de dag bdag nyid 'jigs skrag myos shing
263a4(rgyud 'grel): gyes te/ bdag mgron med par shes nas 'bros par 'gyur// gang bdud de dag gi ral gri dang / mtshon rtse gnyis pa dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / rdo ba dang / stA ra 'bab pa de dag byang chub sems dpa'i
263a5(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams kyi byin gyis man+dA ra ba'i me tog dang / tsam pa ka dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / ut+pa lA dang / pad+mar gyur nas 'babru bo// gang bdud de dag gi tshig rtsub po dang / tshog brlang po de dag ni
263a6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' la bsting par grag go// byang chub sems dpa'i la ni nam yang yid du mi 'ong ba'i yul drug snang bar mi 'gyuraro// bsams pa tsam gyis de'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad
263b1(rgyud 'grel): na mkha' lngas 'byung ngo // de yang de'i rang gi bsod nams kyi dab gis na mkha'i mdzod dang / lag na rin po las phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'byung ste/ sems can thams cad 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//
263b2(rgyud 'grel): de yi rang gi bsod nams kyi dbang gis lag na rin po che de ni tshe'i tshad bskal bar gnas te/ brjod kyang byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi stobs kyis mtha' rtogs par sla ba ma yin te/ 'di ni byang
263b3(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi stobs zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i sgrub pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sgrub pa'i stobs ni rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa bsgrub
263b4(rgyud 'grel): pU dang / tshul khrims bsgrub pa dang / bzod pa bsgrub pa dang / ban 'grus bsgrubs pa dang / bsam gtan bsgrubs pa dang / shes rab bsgrubasra pa dang / thabs bsgrub pa dang / smon lam bsgrub pa dang / stobs bsgrub
263b5(rgyud 'grel): baM dang / ye shes bsgrub pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgrub pa rnam pa bcu zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sgrib pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni sgrub
263b6(rgyud 'grel): pa bcu po 'di'i nang du 'dus par blta'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa bsgrub pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa'i chos gang gis sems can rnams la gnod par 'gyur ba ma
264a1(rgyud 'grel): gtogs par sems can rnams la mi sbyin pa gang yang medo// byang chub sems dpa'i sems gang gis sbyin pa byin pa'i sems de la ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems
264a2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bzod pa thob pa ma gtogs par sems can gzhan rnams kyis dad par sla ba ma yin na/ shes par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa bsgrub pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub
264a3(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa'i tshul khrims bsgrub pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims bsgrub pa ni rnam pa bcu'o// rnam pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sbom pa'i tshul khrims bsgrub pa dang /
264a4(rgyud 'grel): rang sangs rgyas kyi sdom pa'i tshul khrims bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa'i tshul khrims bsgrub pa dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa bsgrub pa dang / dge ba'i
264a5(rgyud 'grel): bshes gnyen kun tu tshol ba mi gtong ba'i tshul khrims bsgrub pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa'i sdom pa'i tshul khrims bsgrub pa dang / rtag tu gzhan gyi don bsgrub pa'i sdom pa'i tshul khrims
264a6(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa dang / byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba'i sdom pa'i tshul khrims bsgrubs pa dang / rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i sdom pa'i tshul khrims bsgrub pa dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i yang
264b1(rgyud 'grel): dag par 'joms pa la bzod pa'i sdom pa'i tshul khrims bsgrub pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par mi rtog pa'i tshul khrims can yin te/ de dag gi tshul khrims bsgrub pa ni thams cad
264b2(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen pa ma yin pa rnams kyis shes par sla ba ma yin te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims bsgrub pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa bsgrub pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'
264b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi bzod pa bsgrub pa ni rnam pa gsumo// rnam pa gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa dang / gzhan gyis gnod par byas pa la mi mjed pa'i bzod pa dang / chos la
264b4(rgyud 'grel): nges par sems pa'i bzod pa'o// sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa ni las bdag gir bye ba la shes pa la 'jug pa'o// gzhan gyis gnod pa byas pa la mi mdzad pa'i bzod pa ni sems can thams
264b5(rgyud 'grel): cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du byams pa la 'jug pa'o// cho sA la nges par sems pa'i bzod pa ni chos thams cad skye ba med par shes pa la 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa rnam
264b6(rgyud 'grel): pa gsum zhes bya'o// gang bzod pa 'di dag bsgrub pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa bsgrub pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus bsgrub pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub
265a1(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' ni gang dang gang du ji lta ji ltar dge ba'i chos rnams yong su 'grub par bya ba'i sbyor ba de dang de 'du shes 'di ltar sbyor te/ bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i
265a2(rgyud 'grel): chos 'di yongasu bsgrub par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan bsgrub pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni mnyam par ma
265a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhag pa'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ste/ de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis snyoms por zhugs pa/ zhi ba sems dang / yid dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang bral ba ma skyes pa 'gags
265a4(rgyud 'grel): shing mi g.yo ba thob par mthong // de bdag ni mnyam par bzhag la gzhan ni rnam par g.yengs pa'o snyam du mi sem so// bdag dang gzhan las rnam par grol ba'i ting 'dzin gzhan yang dag por rjesu mi mthong
265a5(rgyud 'grel): la/ byang chub yang dag par bsgrub pa'i brtson 'grus kyang mi nyams pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan bsgrub pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab bsgrub pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub
265a6(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' ni gang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba las rnam par grol ba dang / gang stong pa nyid las rnam par grol ba dang / gang mtshan ma med pa las rnam par grol ba dang / gang smon pa med pa las rnam par
265b1(rgyud 'grel): grol ba dang / gang na mkha' las rnam par grol ba'i chos de yang yang dag par rjesu mi mthong la/ byang chub kyi lam dang / sems can yong su smin par bya ba'i brtson 'grus kyang mi nyams pa 'di ni byang chub
265b2(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa'i shes rab bsgrub pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i thabs bsgrub pa gang zhe na/ gang byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag kyang mi dmigs la/ rtag tu bdag nyid kyis sbed po yang spyod // /
265b3(rgyud 'grel): sems can yang mi dmigs la/ rtag tu sems can yongasu smin par byed pa'i brtson pa yang spyo // nyon mongs pa yang mi dmigs la/ rtag tu dbang po rnams sbed pa yang spyod // de la gang sangs rgyas
265b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi gzugs ma yin pa'i gzugs cung zad kyang snang bar mi 'gyur la/ rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong ba 'dod pa yang yin no// de la gang chos kyi sgra ma yin pa'i sgra gang yang grag par mi 'gyur la/ rtag tu
265b5(rgyud 'grel): chos nyan pas ngoms mi myong ba yang yino// 'khor ba yang mi dmigs la/ rtag tu 'khor bas 'jigs pa'i yid dang ldan pa yang yin no// mya dran las 'das pa yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
265b6(rgyud 'grel): la/ mya ngan las 'das pa khong du chung bar bya ba'i phyir bdog pa thams cad yongasu gtong bar yang byed do// sangs rgyas dang byang chub kyang mi dmigs la/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub khong du chud
266a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba'i phyir smon lam brgya stong mang po yang mngon par bsgrub ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i thabs bsgrub pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam bsgrub pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byung
266a2(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' ni chos gang yang 'bri ba 'am 'phel bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la yang rjes su yi rang nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
266a3(rgyud 'grel): bsngo bar byed do// rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas 'dis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ bdag gi sangs
266a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kyi zhing 'di 'dra bar gyur cig/ 'khor phun sum tshogs pa 'di 'dra bar gyur cig/ ces bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed do// de'i smon lam de yang dag par 'grub pa ste/ mi
266a5(rgyud 'grel): 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// de'i tshul khrims ma zhig pa/ ma nyams pa/ 'dren ma ma yin pa/ ma gyur pa/ mkhas pas bsngags pa bsrung ngo // de tshul khrims de la rab tu gnas pas sems smon pa 'grub par
266a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam grub pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bsgrub pa gang zhe na/ gil te la la zhig gi sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su bsgyur nas byang chub sems
266b1(rgyud 'grel): dpa'i gan du 'ongs te/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las zlog par byed/ 'dun pa zlog par byed/ dpral bar byed kyang byang chub sems dpa' de 'dun pa zlog par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub nyid rjes su dran no//
266b2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub kyi snying po rjesu dran no// bdud 'dul ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang / snying rje chen po mngon du byed do// sems can gang byang chub sems dpa'i de'i 'dun pa zlog par byed/ dpral
266b3(rgyud 'grel): bar byed/ rnam par zlog par byed pa'i sems can de la yang byang chub sems dpa'i khong khro bar mi 'gyur gyi/ sems can de la byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po bskyed de/ dang pa dang / brtson 'grus
266b4(rgyud 'grel): dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi stobs las kyang mi nyams te/ de'i phyir mi ldog pa'i stobs des sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la rab tu
266b5(rgyud 'grel): 'god/ rab tu 'jud de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bsgrub pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes bsgrub pa gang zhe na/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di la skye ba 'am 'tsho ba
266b6(rgyud 'grel): 'am rga ba yang med do// 'di dag ni chos tsam du zad de bdag dang bdag gi dang bral ba'o// zhes chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de ye shes kyi stobs de nyid kyis sems
267a1(rgyud 'grel): can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ye shes kyi stobs de rab tu 'god do// sems can thams cad kyis chos nyid de las rnam par bzlog nas 'jig rten gyi chos rnams las rab tu 'jog
267a2(rgyud 'grel): mi nus te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes bsgrub pa'o// 'di ni sgrub pa rnam pa bcu ste/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bcu zhes bya ste/ stobs mtha' yas pa gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang rnam
267a3(rgyud 'grel): par smin pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros la mngon par 'gyur byas stobs po che la zhes bya'o// // byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin la ni ye shes kyi pha
267a4(rgyud 'grel): rol tu phyin pa la lhag par spyod pas na ye shes rgya mtsho'o// de yang rgya mtsho dang 'dra bas rgya mtsho ste/ rgya mtsho ni 'jug par dka' ba nyid dang / ro gcig pa nyid dang / rin po che thams cad kyi gan su gyur pa dang
267a5(rgyud 'grel): sems can dpag tu med pa'i gnasu gyur par chos mthun pa ca no// de bzhin du ye shes rgya mtsho dang 'dra ste/ nyan thos dang / rang rgyal dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa
267a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyis 'jug mi nus pa dang / stong pa nyid du ro gcig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rin po che'i 'byung gan su gyur pa dang / skye gnas dang 'gro ba dang / rigs kyi dbye bas phye ba'i sems
267b1(rgyud 'grel): can rnams nyon mongs pa las ldog cing bde ba 'thob ste/ mchog tu dbugs 'byin pa'i 'tshang rgya ba nyid kyi gan su gyur pas sems can dpag tu med pa'i gan su gyur ba'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho de lta bu
267b2(rgyud 'grel): dang tha mi dad pa'i ye shes ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs yin pas ye shes rgya mtsho zhes bya ste/ de las byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs mi zad pa gang zhe na/ rgyu drang rkyen gang dag gi ye shes
267b3(rgyud 'grel): rtogs par 'gyur ba'i rgyu de dag dang rkyen de dag byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bsgrub ste/ de dag la ni rgyu ni gang / rkyen ni gang zhe na/ gang 'di ye shes yong su tshol ba la rab tu 'dun pa/ ye shes
267b4(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la rtag tu bstan pa dang / 'grogs pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / gang yang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la rton cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la
267b5(rgyud 'grel): mi rton pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag la nga rgyal med cing bla ma bzhin du phangs par 'dzin pa dang / ston pa bzhin du phangs par 'dzin pa ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag gis kyang 'di bsam
267b6(rgyud 'grel): pa phun sum tshogs par rig nas 'bel ba'i gtam dang ye shes kyi gtam sgrub par byedado// snod du rig nas rgyun mi 'chad par phyi rol ma yin pa'i chos ston to// des chos de dag thos nas chos kyi tshogs
268a1(rgyud 'grel): la sbyor bar byed de/ gang chos kyi tshogs la sbyor ba de ni de ye shes kyi tshogs yino// de la chos kyi tshogs la sbyor ba gang zhe na/ gang 'di don nyung ba dang / bya ba nyung ba dang / smra ba nyung
268a2(rgyud 'grel): ba dang / yo byad nyung ba dang / namo gyi cha stong dang nam gyi cha smad lo mi nyal zhing rnal 'byor la brtson pa dang / thos pa'i don la rtog po dang / yang dang yang tshol ba dang / sems la rnyog pa med pa dang / sgrib
268a3(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams rnam par sel ba dang / ltung ba rnams las byung ba shes pa dang / 'gyod pa med pa dang / kun nas ltung ba med pa dang / sgrub pa la snying por byed pa dang / chos la gzhol ba dang / chos la 'bab
268a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / rtul ba dang ldan pa dang / ye shes tshol bA la mgo dang gos la me 'byar ba lta bu dang / de la ma chags par gnas pa dang / tshul khrims lnga mi lhong pa dang / brtson pa mi gtong ba dang / khyad par
268a5(rgyud 'grel): du 'gro ba dang / 'du 'dzi la mi dga' ba dang / gcig pur dga' ba dang / dgron pa la mngon du phyogs shing yid la byed pa dang / 'phags pa'i rigs chog shes pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tron dag
268a6(rgyud 'grel): las mi g.yo ba dang / chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i sngags dran par 'dzin pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos tshol ba dang / brjed pa med pa dang / don rtogs
268b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rje su 'gro ba dang / blo glos kyi lam dang mthun pa dang / brtan pas sdom pa dang / rkyen rnams kyi ye shes kyi rjesu 'gro ba dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pas brgyan pa dang / ye shes kyi rjes su
268b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba lhur len pa dang / mi shes pa sel ba dang / ma rig pa dang / gti mug gi mun pa dang / rab rib kyi ling tog gis chod pa bsal ba dang / shes rab kyi mig rnam par dag pa dang / blo shin tu rnam
268b3(rgyud 'grel): par dag pa dang / blo rgya che ba dang / blo ma zhum pa dang / blo ma gyes pa dang / mngon sum du shes pa dang / yon+da tan gzhan la rag ma lus pa dang / bdag gi yon tan mi bsnyems pa dang / gzhan gyi yon tan
268b4(rgyud 'grel): yongasu brjod pa dang / legs par bya ba'i las byed pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa dang / 'gal bar mi byed pa dang / las yongasu dag pa'i ye shes te/ btsun pa shu rat+na ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems
268b5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs mi zad pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang ye shes kyi tshogs rnam pa bzhi ste/ rnam pa bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa bzhi po 'di dag ni ye shes tshogs rab tu bsags par 'gyur
268b6(rgyud 'grel): te/ bzhi po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos smra ba rnams la grog dang / skyug gu dang / snag tsha dang glegs bam sbyin pa dang / chos spra bo rnams la chos kyi stan sna tshogs sbyin pa dang / chos smra ba rnams la
269a1(rgyud 'grel): rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang tshigasu bcad pa thams cad sbyin pa dang / chos smra ba rnams la chos bsdu ba'i phyir g.yo med par leg so zhes bya ba sbyin pa ste/ sbyin pa bzhi po de dag
269a2(rgyud 'grel): ni ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur ro// srung ba bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos smra ba rnams rje bo
269a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du bsrung ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsrung ba dang / yul dang ljongs kyi phyogs bsrung ba dang / phan pa'i dngos po bsrung ba ste/ srung ba bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yed shes
269a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyuraro// nye bar ston pa bzhi po 'dra dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ chos smra ba rnams la zung zing gis nye bar
269a5(rgyud 'grel): ston pa dang / chos kyis nye bar ston pa dang / shes rab kyis nye bar ston pa dang / ye shes kyis nye bar ston pa ste bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par
269a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro// stobs lnga po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mos pa'i phyir dang pa'i stobs dang / thos pa tshol ba'i phyir brtson 'grus
269b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi stobs dang / byang chub kyi sems dpa' mi brjed pa'i phyir dran pa'i stobs dang / mnyam pa nyid la sems nges par sems pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / thos pa'i stobs kyi phyir shes
269b2(rgyud 'grel): rab kyi stobs te/ stobs lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes
269b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos la rab tu dga' ba'i tshul khrims dang / chos yong su tshol ba'i tshul khrims dang / chos la nges par sems pa'i tshul khrims
269b4(rgyud 'grel): dang / byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba'i tshul khrims te/ tshul khrims bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bzod bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems
269b5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos tshol ba la brtson pas ngan du brjod pa dang / ngan du smra ba'i tshig lam bzod pa dang / chos tshul ba
269b6(rgyud 'grel): la brtson pas rlung dang / nyi ma dang / grang ba dang / cha ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa bzod pa dang / chos tshol ba la brtson pas mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / mthun par 'jug pa'i bzod pa dang /
270a1(rgyud 'grel): chos tshol ba la brtson pas stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos la bzod pa ste/ bzod pa bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi
270a2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan pa'i brtson 'grus dang / 'dzin
270a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i brtson 'grus dang / brtan pa'i brtson 'grus dang / nan tan gyi brtson 'grus te/ brtson 'grus bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bsam
270a4(rgyud 'grel): gtan gyi yan lag bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dben pa dang rtse gcig pa'i bsam gtan dang / mngon
270a5(rgyud 'grel): par shes pa tshol dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la rton pa ste/ bsam gtan gyi yan lag bzhi po 'di dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur ro// shes rab
270a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi snang ba bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chad pa la mi gnas pa dang / rtag pa la mi 'jug pa
270b1(rgyud 'grel): dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / mi 'gal ba dang / bdagra med pa la bzod pa ste/ shes rab kyi snang bA bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par
270b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro// thabs bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur ti/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi rje su 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi rje su 'jug pa dang /
270b3(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi rjesu 'jug pa dang / ye shes kyi rjesu 'jug pa ste/ thabs bzhi po 'di dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur ro// lam bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems
270b4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam dang / sa'i lam dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi lam dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi
270b5(rgyud 'grel): lam ste/ lam bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshigs rdzogs par 'gyuraro// mi ngoms pa bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi cho gas rdzogs
270b6(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thos pas mi ngoms pa dang / bstan pas mi ngoms pa dang / dpyod pas mi ngoms pa dang / shes pas mi ngoms pa ste/ mi ngoms pa bzhi po 'di dag ni byed
271a1(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ye shes kyi tshogs ni gang sems can thams cad kyi rje su 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad
271a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi rjesu 'gro ba'o// sbyin pa las kyang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogasu blta'o// de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab las kyang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs su
271a3(rgyud 'grel): blta'o// byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms las kyang ye shes kyi tshe gsu blta ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i rtsom pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ye shes kyi grub pa/ ye
271a4(rgyud 'grel): shes sngon du 'gro ba ye shes la rton pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la gnas pa'i phyir te/ ye shes dang ldan pa thams cad la rton pa yino// bdud thams cad kyis kyang de la glags mi rnyed do// de la sangs rgyas
271a5(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi snod thams cad kyang nye bar gnas pa yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyang 'thob bo// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang 'thob par byed de/ 'di ni ye shes kyi tshogs mi zad pa zhes bya ste/ sbyor
271a6(rgyud 'grel): ba de dag gnas skabs la 'di ni sbyor ba na yang rnam par smin pa'i sa la rnam pa thams cad du yongasu rdzogs pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / lhun gyi sa grub pa dang / rnam par mi rtogs pa dang / sgrib pa
271b1(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su gyur pas ye shes kyi tshogs yongasu rdzogs pa dang / ye shes kyi tshogs nyid yin pas bcom ldan 'das ni ye shes kyi tshigs te/ tshigasu bcad pa dang mi mthun
271b2(rgyud 'grel): par tshigs gzhan du bstan pa ni sa'i rim pas bshad pas na nyes pa med do// // da ni tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid du bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med
271b3(rgyud 'grel): snying rje chen po blo yi mchog/ shes rab chen po blo chen ldan// mkhas pa chen po thabs che ba// zhes bya ba gsungs te/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms bzhi ni tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi ste/
271b4(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o// de'i don du gnas pas na tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi'o// de la byams pa ni gsum ste/ sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pa dang / chos la dmigs pa dang / dmigs pa
271b5(rgyud 'grel): med pa'o// de yang dmigs pa med pa'i byams pa'i bdag nyid du gyur pas na byams chen rang bzhin te/ de nyid kyis na dpag tu med pa'o// de yang blo glos mi zad pas bstan pa'i mdo las gsungs te/ btsun pa
271b6(rgyud 'grel): radwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa yang mi zad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thug pa med pa'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa ni thug pa med par byas te/ de dag gi byams pa
272a1(rgyud 'grel): bar+ya sgrub pa yongasu chad pa med do// 'di ltar sems can gyi khams ji tsam pa de tsam du byang chub sems dpa' de'i byams pa'i sems bskyed pas khyab par byedado// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di
272a2(rgyud 'grel): lta ste/ dper na na mkha'i khams 'dis gar yang ma khyab pa mdo// btsun pa shwa ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa 'dis gang ma khyab pa'i sems can de dgang yang med do// 'di lta ste dper na
272a3(rgyud 'grel): sems can gyi khams ni tshad med/ de la zad pa medado// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa bsgom pa yang tshad med de/ de la zad pa med 'di ltar na mkha' mi zad pas na sems can mi zad/ sems can
272a4(rgyud 'grel): mi zad pas nA byams pa mi zad/ de'i phyir skyes bu dam pa de dag byams pa mi zad pa zhes bya'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bus byang chub sems dpa' b+h+rUM gros mi zad pa la 'di skad
272a5(rgyud 'grel): ces smra so// rigs kyi bu sems can gyi khams 'di ji tsam/ blo gros mi zad pas smras pa/ btsun pa sha rat+na ti'i bu sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams ji snyed pa de bas kyang
272a6(rgyud 'grel): sems can gyi khams ches mang ngo // sbas pa/ rigs kyi bu dpe bya bar mi nus sam/ blo gros mi zang bas smras pa/ btsun pa sha radwa ti'i bu nus mod kyi/ rgya chung ngus ni ma yin no// btsun pa sha radwa ti'i bu
272b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / de bzhin du nub phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun tu
272b2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed de dag thams cad rgya mtsho chen po chus yongasu gang ba gcig tu gyur la/ sems can gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'dus te/ skra'i rtse mo brgyar
272b3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa'i chas de la chu'i thigs pa gcig blangs la/ de bzhin du gzhan yang sems can gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'dus te bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshegs
272b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i chas chu'i thig pa gnyis blangs la mtshan ma bzhag pa 'di dang / bgrang ba 'di lta bus bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cing sems can gang gA'i klung gi bye ma slad dag gis skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshegs pa'i chu'i
272b5(rgyud 'grel): thigs pa ra re blangs pas pas chu'i phung po de tsam zad par gyur kyang sems can gyi khams de ni zad pa 'am mtha' thug pa gang yang med do// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus ji ltar sems can gyi khams tshad med de/ de dag la
272b6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa'i byams pas khyab par byed do// btsun pa sha radwa bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang gi byams pa de lta bu bsgom pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa de zad par nus sam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin te/
273a1(rgyud 'grel): byams pa bsgom pa'i dge ba'i rna ba de 'dra ba zad par su 'dod pa de ni na mkha' zad par 'dod do// byang chub sems dpa' gang gis byams pa mi zad pa 'di thos nas skrag par mi 'gyur na de dag
273a2(rgyud 'grel): kyang byams pa mi zad par 'phags par 'gyur ro// blo gros mi zad pas smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byams pa ni bdag bsrung zhing gzhan la phan par gnas pa ste/ mchog tu rtsod pa med pa dang / gnod sems kyi tha ba'i
273a3(rgyud 'grel): skyon dang / khro ba dang khon du 'dzin pa thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'o// bag la nyal dang kun nas ldang ba dang / bral ba ste/ dang pa skyed cing sems can thams cad kyi 'khrul pa la nyes par mi blta'o// yongasu gdung ba med
273a4(rgyud 'grel): cing lus dang sems bde ba bskyed pa ste/ gzhan gyis gnod par bya ba las shin tu 'das pa'o// nyes pa thams cad kyi 'jigs pa dang / bral ba ste/ 'phags pa'i lam dang / mthun zhing gshe ba dang / spang ba'i sems
273a5(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams dod par byed pa/ yul thams cad los sgrol ba ste/ dbyug pa dang mtshon cha 'tshang ba ma yin no// sems can thams cad rab tu thar par bya ba la dga' ba/ khong khro ba thams cad dang
273a6(rgyud 'grel): bral ba/ tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag dang / thob kyis 'jal ba thams cad dang bral ba/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshi gsu bcad pa thams cad 'byung bar byed pa/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong
273b1(rgyud 'grel): ba thams cad kyi phyag byas pa/ rang gi gzi brjid kyi rgyan gyi brgyan pa/ mkhas pas rab tu bsngags pa/ byis pa thams cad srung ba/ tshangs pa'i lam dang mthun pa/ 'dod pa'i khams dang ma 'dres pa/ sems can
273b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi thar pa'i lam gyi mchog theg pa thams cad yang dag par bsdus pa/ zang zong med pa'i bsod nams kyis bzung ba/ bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad bsags pa/ rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams
273b3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i dngos po thams cad kyisku zil gyis mi non pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa/ dbang po nyams pa dang ma tshang ba thams cad spangs pa/ bde ba 'gro thams
273b4(rgyud 'grel): cad dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam dang mthun pa/ ngan song thams cad dang mi khom pa brgyad las 'das pa/ chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos pa/ 'dod pa dang longs spyod kyi dbang phyug la mngon par dga'
273b5(rgyud 'grel): ba med pa/ sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang / sbyin pa'i sbyor ba tha dad pa dang bral ba/ tshul khrims drang bslab pa thams cad kyi sgo dang / tshul khrims 'tshal ba thams cad yong su sgrub pa/ bzod
273b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i stobs ston pa/ nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / sregs pa thams cad dang bral ba 'phags pa rnams 'jug pa'i bsam gtan dang / ting 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i rtsa ba mi 'khrugs pa'i
274a1(rgyud 'grel): brtson 'grus brtsams shing yang dag par sbyor ba bya ba thams cad las yang dag par sgrol ba/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pas nyon
274a2(rgyud 'grel): myongs pa thams cad las nges par 'byung ba/ gsang sngags dang thos pa 'dzin pas nges par sems pa'i shes rab kyi rgyu bskyed pa/ rang gi phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs la nges pa/ bdud kyi phyogs dang
274a3(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs pa rnams bsal ba/ 'grogs na bde ba/ bsnyen bkur dang 'jug pa'i rgyu mthun pa la sems la/ spyod lam srung bar byed pa/ rgod pa thams cad las 'das pa/ nga rgyal gyi las sel ba/ ngo tsha shes
274a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang khrel yod pas byug shing dri zhim pa ste/ bag chags dang mtshams sbyor ba dang nyon mongs pa'i dri nga ba sbyod ba'o// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byams pa ni dri zhim pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su
274a5(rgyud 'grel): skyob pa ste/ byams pa chen po ni bdag gi bde ba gtong zhing sems can rnams la bde bya sbyin pa'o// nyan thos kyi byams pa ni bdagra skyob pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa chen po ni sems can
274a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad yongasu skyob pa'o// btsun pa sha radwa ti'i bu byams pa ni chu bo las sgrol ba'o// btsun pa sha radwa ti'i bu byams pa ni gsum po 'od dag ste/ gsum gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can la dmigra
274b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i byams pa dang / chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa dang / dmigs pa med pa'i byams pa'o// sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o// chos
274b2(rgyud 'grel): la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o// dmigs pa med pa'i byams pa ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ste/ btsun pa sha
274b3(rgyud 'grel): rat+na ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa mi zad pa zhes bya ste/ de bsA nA byang chub sems dpa' byams pa mi zad pa ji skad gsungs pa de lta bu'i byams pa'i ngo bo nyid du 'gyur bas/ byams
274b4(rgyud 'grel): chen rang bzhin dpog tu med ces bya'o// thugs rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid du bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ snying rje chen po blo yi mchog ces bya ba gsungs te/ thugs rje chen pos brnyan pa'i ngo bo ny-i yin pas skyong rje
274b5(rgyud 'grel): chen po'o// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni shes rab kyi mchog yin pas b+h+yo yaM mchog go// 'di yang byams pa bzhin du sems can dpag tu med pa la dmyigs par brjod par bya'o// de bas na snying rje chen+ta b+ho sngon du
274b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gzhan gyi don phyir tshigs thams cad nye bar sogs par 'gyur ba ste/ de yang btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi snying rje chen
275a1(rgyud 'grel): po yang myi zad pa ste/ de ci'i phyiru zhe na/ sngon du 'gro ba'i phyi // bats+tshan pA shA radwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dpe rA na dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa nI skyes bu'i sgrog gI dbang po'i sngon du 'gro
275a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// de bzhin du theg pa chen po yang dag par sgrub po'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'o snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i 'khor lo rin po che ni rin po che sna bdun gyi
275a3(rgyud 'grel): sngon du 'gro ba'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dge par sgrub pa la snying rje chen po ni sngon du 'gro ba'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na tshong dpon nam khyim bang gi gcig pu
275a4(rgyud 'grel): gcig pu la snying thag pa nas sdug par 'dzin pa de bzhin du snying rje chen po la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad snying thag pa nas sdug par 'dzin pa yino// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i
275a5(rgyud 'grel): bu snying rje chen po zhes bya ba ni 'di bdag nyid kyis byas pa na de'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya'o// rang gis byas pas na snying rje chen po'o// gzhan gyi skabs mi rnyed pas na snying rje chen po'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste/
275a6(rgyud 'grel): gang gi phyir de lta bu ni snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid yin la/ bcom ldan 'das kyang de'i rang bzhin yin te/ nges par 'byung ba thams cad kyi rgyu yin par shes par bya ste/ de bas na blo yi mchog ces bya'o// /
275b1(rgyud 'grel): shes rab chen po blo chen ldan zhes bya ba ni dga' ba chen po'i ngo bo nyid bstan pa yin te/ de la dga' ba chen po gang zhe na/ gang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dran pa dang / rjesu dran pa dang dga' ba dang mos pa
275b2(rgyud 'grel): dang / mchog tu dga' ba de la ni dga' ba zhes bya ste/ chos thams cad khong du chud pas dga' bar 'gyur pa de ni shes rab med na mi 'byung bas shes rab nyid rgyu yin te/ des pas na shes rab chen po zhes bya ste/
275b3(rgyud 'grel): glang la shes rab chen po yod pa de ni shes rab chen po'o// rab tu dga' ba'i shes+ya rab brnyes nas kyang sems can thams cad ky-i drin mdzad pa la thugs gzhi la bsnu na blo chen ldan zhes bya ste/ dri ma med pa'i blo
275b4(rgyud 'grel): gros ni blo'o// yul thams cad pa ni che ba ste/ de lta bu'i shes rab gang la mnga' ba de ni blo chen ldan zhes bya'o// de la dga' ba dang de'i ngo bo nyid brjod par bya ste/ de yang sems mi 'gong zhing mi brdzi ba dang / srid pa med pa dang /
275b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad gtong ba dang / chos kyi dga' ba thams cad kyi rten dang / sems mchog tu dga' ba dang / lus rab tu sim pa dang / sangs rgyas la dga' zhing yi rang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la
275b6(rgyud 'grel): dga' zhing mos pas mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan tshol la mkhas pa dang / dge ba'i chos nyan pas mi skyo ba dang / de kho na'i chos la rton pa'i nan tan dang / dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang /
276a1(rgyud 'grel): rab tu dga' bas chos la mos pa dang / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems can rnams la khong khro ba med pa'i blo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol ba la shin tu dran pa dang / chos la 'dun pa yang
276a2(rgyud 'grel): mi 'dor ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po dag la mod shing rnam par grol ba dang / nyi tshe ba'i theg pa bsal te sems bskyed pa dang / ser sna med pas ma zhum par sems bskyed pa dang / slong ba la sbyin pa
276a3(rgyud 'grel): byin nas 'khor gsum yongasu dag par sbyangs pa dang / sbyin pa la mchog tu dga' ba dang tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la dad pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la rjesu 'dzin cing byams pa dang / rang gi tshul
276a4(rgyud 'grel): khrims yongasu dag pas ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa thams cad las shin tu 'da' bar dbugs 'byin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims la yongasu bsngo ba dang / bstan zhing mi phyed pa dang / pha rol
276a5(rgyud 'grel): dran du brjod pa dang / ngan du smra ba'i tshig gi lam la khong khro med pa'i sems kyis bzod cing nges pa dang / nga rgyal med pa dang / bla ma la 'dud cing ri mor byed pa dang / rtag tu 'dzum pa'i bzhin dang / khro gnyer
276a6(rgyud 'grel): med pa dang / gsong por smra ba dang / tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / kha gsag med pa dang / thob kyi 'jal ba med pa dang / bsam pa dag pa dang / sems la brlang ba med pa dang / gya gyu med pa dang / thams cad la
276b1(rgyud 'grel): phan yon du blta ba dang / skyon med par blta ba dang / ltung ba mi gleng ba dang / yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rje su 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ston pa ltar phangasu 'dzin pa dang /
276b2(rgyud 'grel): chos rnams la bdag bzhin du phangasu 'dzin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la srog bzhin du phangasu 'dzin pa dang / bla ma rnams la phra ma bzhin du phangasu 'dzin pa dang / sems can rnams la bu bzhin du phangs
276b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa dang / mkhan po dang slob dpon rnams la sangs rgyas bzhin du phang su 'dzin pa dang / nan tan rnams la yan lag gi dam pa mgo bzhin du phang su 'dzin pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la rkang lag
276b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du 'phangasu 'dzin pa dang / chos smra ba rnams la rin po che thams cad bzhin du phangasu 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thams cad la yid bzhin gyi nor bu bzhin du phang su 'dzin pa dang / rjesu
276b5(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa rnams la dga' ba'i rtsed mo bzhin du phangasu 'dzin pa dang / chog shes pa rnams lnga nad med pa bzhin du phangasu 'dzin pa dang / chos 'tshal ba rnams la sman bzhin du phangasu 'dzin pa dang / bskul zhing
276b6(rgyud 'grel): dran par byed pa rnams la sman pa bzhin du sangs rgya su 'dzin pa ste/ btsun pa sha rat+na ti'i bu de ltar gang dbang po thams cad la dbang po ma 'god pa 'di ni dga' ba chen po zhes bya'o// dga' ba chen po zhes
277a1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni rtog pa'i ye shes kyi phyir zhi ba'i rnam pa'o// mi rgod pa'i phyir rab tu zhi ba'i rnam pa'o// khengs pa ma yin pa'i phyir shin tu sbyangs pa'i rnam pa'o// rnam par mi g.yeng ba'i phyir dbang
277a2(rgyud 'grel): popo dga' ba'i rnam pa'o// mi nyams pa'i brtul zhugs kyi rnam pa'o// 'dod pa'i phyir nges pa'i rnam pa'o// dka' blo bde ba'i phyir thos pa'i rnam pa'o// sems la su rung ba'i phyir nye bar zhi ba'i rnam pa'o// las
277a3(rgyud 'grel): legs par byas pa'i phyir dga' ba'i rnam pa'o// kha na ma tho ba med pa'i phyir mi 'gyod pa'i rnam pa'o// ma g.yos pa'i phyir shin tu gnas pa'i rnam pa'o// mi gnas pa'i phyir ma g.yos pa'i rnam pa'o// thul bar
277a4(rgyud 'grel): dka' ba'i phyir snyen dka' ba'i rnam pa'o// chung mi za ba'i phyir don gyi rnam pa'o// mu nor pa de bzhin nyid kyi badren pa'i rnam pa'o// de byed pa'i phyir de kho na'o rnam pa'o// stobs kyi phyir spro ba'i rnam pa'o// mi rdzu ba'i
277a5(rgyud 'grel): phyir stobs kyi rnam pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yong dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshol bas mi skyo ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos yong su rdzogs par byed pa'i rnam pa ste/ de lta bu'i dga' ba'i ngo bo ni
277a6(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das yin zhes ston par 'gyur ro// mkhas pa chen po thabs che ba zhes bya ba ni btang snyoms chen po'i ngo bo nyid du bstan par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin te/ de yang thabs chen po gang la mnga'
277b1(rgyud 'grel): pa de ni thabs chen po zhes bya'o// gnas skabs 'dir btang snyoms chen po ni thabs chen po ste/ bsam pa sna tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i gdul bya'i sems can rnams 'dul ba'i phyi ro// de yang byang chub sems
277b2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' rnams kyi btang snyoms rnam pa gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa la btang snyoms pa dang / bdag dang gzhan bsrung ba'i btang snyoms dang / dus dang dus ma yin pa la btang
277b3(rgyud 'grel): snyoms pa'o// de la nyon mongs pa la btang snyoms pa ni bsti stang du byas pas ma thos par mi sems pa dang / bsti steng du ma byas pas dmas par mi sems pa dang / rnyed pa dag la rlom sems med pa
277b4(rgyud 'grel): dang ma rnyed pa dag la yi chad pa med pa dang / snyan pa dag la mngon par dga' ba med pa dang / mi snyan pa la zhum pa med pa dang / smad pas sro shi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / bsngags pa la chos nyid rab tu gnas
277b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / sdug bsngal dag la so sor rtog pa'i stobs dang / bde ba dag la mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal bar rtog pa'i stobs dang / rjesu chags pa 'dor ba dang / khong khro ba spong bas mdza' ba dang / ma
277b6(rgyud 'grel): mdza' ba dag la sems mnyam pa dang tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams la blo mnyam pa dang / legs par byas pa dag dang nyes par byas pa rnams la yang gnyisu mi byed
278a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / sdug pa dang mi sdug par mi blta ba dang / legs par thos pa dang nyes par thos pa la mi 'byed pa dang / legasdu par smras pa dang nyes par smra ba la bag la nyal med pa dang / ro myong ba'i
278a2(rgyud 'grel): nyes dmigs rnams la mtshungs par yongasu 'jal ba dang / sems can thams cad la bsam pa mnyam pa dang / lus dang srog la mi blta ba dang / rab dang 'bring dang tha ma rnams la 'od zer mnyam pa dang /
278a3(rgyud 'grel): bsngags pa dang bsngags pa ma yin pa rnams la sems mnyam pa dang / bde ba dang mi bde ba rnams la rang gi sems yong su dag pa ste/ btsun pa sha radwa ti'i bu de ltar gang bsti stang du byed pa dang / gnod par
278a4(rgyud 'grel): byed pa la mtho dman du mi sems shing / de la byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms pa yin te/ btsun pa sha radwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nyon mongs pa la btang snyoms pa zhes bya'o// de
278a5(rgyud 'grel): la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdag dang gzhan bsrung ba'i btang snyoms gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' lus dang yan lag dang nying lag rnams bcud kyang khong khro bar mi byed cing mi tshol
278a6(rgyud 'grel): teni btang snyoms pa yin no// lus kyi rnam par 'gyur ba las sam/ ngag gi rnam par 'gyur ba las kyang rung ste/ gnyis ka las bzod pas na de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o// mig gi rnam pas rma mi phyin
278b1(rgyud 'grel): gzugs kyi rna mA pA las kyang rma mi phyin te/ gnyis kas kyang rma ma phyin to// de bzhin du rna bas ma yin/ sgras ma yin/ snas ma yin/ dris ma yin/ lces ma yin/ ros ma yin/ lus kyis ma yin//
278b2(rgyud 'grel): reg byas ma yin/ yid kyi rnam pas kyang rma mi phyin/ chos kyi rnam pas kyang rma mi phyin te/ de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o// rma mi phyin cing nyams pa med pas de'i phyir btang snyoms shes bya'o// rma phyung ba la rma mi phyin pas
278b3(rgyud 'grel): de'i phyi btang snyoms zhes bya'o// bdag dang gzhan gnyi ga bsrung bas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o// phan par byed pa dang gnod par byed pa la mnyam par sbyor bas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o// btang snyoms
278b4(rgyud 'grel): ni mchog tu rtsod pa med pa'o// btang snyoms ni rang gi sems la nges par sems pa'o// btang snyoms ni gzhan gyi sems bsrung ba'o// btang snyoms ni bodag la rtog pa'o// bta snyoms ni sems can gzhan
